subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders beat the Senators, 3-2, in the opener of a preseason split-squad doubleheader and won the second game as well, on a shootout after a 2-2 tie.
snippet: The Islanders beat the Senators, 3-2, in the opener of a preseason split-squad doubleheader and won the second game as well, on a shootout after a 2-2 tie.
